name: InnSight

reviews.text: The place is very very lovely, neat and clean. Charles and Shirley were very friendly and helpful. The bathroom is very small but it is bright clean and always dry. Location is also great! There are lots of good restaurants around the hostel and you can walk to the shopping mall or the avenue of star just few minutes. I'll definitely stay in InnSight the next time we visit HongKong.
reviews.title: Highly Recommend!

reviews.text: Stayed overnight so we can experience staying in TST for shopping and dining. Hostel was really great. Credit to the owners, Shirley and Charlie. They were so accommodating, hospitable and organized! They really wanted the best experience to their guests. Plus they speak good english! They were so adorable! Rooms are neat and clean with flat screen TV. Bathroom is small but okay. Location of the hostel is a major plus. It's beside the MTR and I-Square Mall, shops and walking distance to specialty boutiques. Our last night in HK was the best!!! Will definitely stay here again and recommend this to my friends.
reviews.title: Best hostel in TST

reviews.text: A very hospitable place, Charles and Shirley have a winning formula. Here are my reasons. Location, the hostel is a 2 steps away from Isquare and the MTR. There are lots of places to eat, lunch dinner or breakfast. There is a small pharmacy a few shops away if you forget your toothpaste. The wifi works great and there is a water dispenser for you to top up your water bottle. I took the Airport Bus A21 to the hostel and the directions are great. It was so easy to find the hostel. If you are squeamish on having a wet floor in your toilet, then it might be best to wear bathroom slippers.
reviews.title: I will be back

reviews.text: Shirley and Charles who co-run the place were very helpful and friendly. The place is clean and neat. Importantly, it is located near the MTR (TST) which makes traveling less of a hassle. Would definitely consider staying here again when I'm back in HK.
reviews.title: Excellent!!! Highly recommended.

reviews.text: We had a great stay (three nights) in InnSight. The room is really clean and quiet. It's located in the centre of Tsim Sha Tsui. Loads of local retaurants, shops can be found in the near. The "avenue of stars" is also within walking distance. The owner is also really nice and willing to help. All in all, we strongly recommend this hostel!
reviews.title: strongly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here last November 2012. The room is exactly how it looks in the pictures. The room is small, typical of hostels and inns in HK. Two medium-sized luggage can practically take up almost all of the walking space (double room). However, I expected the bathroom to be really cramped based on the reviews, but it was just okay. Small, but still has some manageable space (although, yes there is no division between the toilet and shower). I am 5"5 and my companion is about 5"7 and the bed was just enough. I could imagine that it would feel really cramped up for anyone bigger.
reviews.title: highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But again, I really didn't mind the small space since we just literally slept there after a tiring day. I basically recommend the inn for its location, cleanliness and friendliness of the staff. Plus they have a water dispenser. The price for the stay was not dirt cheap, but we were highly satisfied.
reviews.title: Above average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The inn is really near the MTR and bus stations, and you could easily walk around Tsim Sha Tsui. The ferry terminal going to Macau is just an easy 10 minute walk (or less since we got lost lol). What I loved most was at night, we usually walked around the block to look for places to eat. Discovered a Hui Lau Shan (famous HK dessert) branch and Food republic nearby, plus some awesome hk street food.
reviews.title: A costly joke

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I do understand the complaints of the other reviewers about the noise, as you can easily hear other guests from inside your room (usually when they enter/exit the inn, and not when they are inside their respective rooms). But I highly doubt that other budget inns/hostels are sound-proofed. :) Fortunately, we have not had any such problems. Fellow guests were actually amicable, greeting us when we meet in the hallways.
reviews.title: good luck on getting a decent night of sleep

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Since I wanted to make a fair and constructive review, I guess the downside for me was the mattress. It was thin and a bit hard for my taste, although I assume most budget inns have the same type of mattress(?). Other than that, I still do recommend this inn and will be back next time. :)
reviews.title: "Sangat bagus"

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Innsight for two nights before heading onward in Asia for a wedding. Our thought was just to have a clean place to stay. The online booking process was simple and I appreciate the email from the owner afterwards to confirm our accommodation details. The instructions provided in the online correspondence proved accurate and we easily found the location.
reviews.title: When all you need is a place to sleep

reviews.text: Carmen checked us in and WA very cheerful and helpful. She provided towels for us and gave us information for entering securely after hours.
reviews.title: Hong Kong Filmart 2013

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked the twin double which was a number setting to save a bit of money but in retrospect since the rates are so reasonable, for a couple, we souls have splurges on the larger layouts as we did not have much room to navigate around each other. That being said, we found the beds themselves very comfortable and slept well. The other guests were courteous to keep the noise curfew at 11pm as the walls are very thin so we didn't have too many problems. The bathroom compartment might take some getting used to for some as because there is no separate shower stall but fine for us. Pump bottles of bathgel and shampoo provided.
reviews.title: Good Things Come in Small Packages

reviews.text: Location-wise, InnSight was great! A fraction of the cost of the nearby big-name hotels. Nearly off of Nathan Road, we were able to walk to the avenue of the stars, to the night markets we were interested in, such as the Jade market and Temple market. We were also able to walk to the Ferry to get to Hong Kong Island.
reviews.title: Lunar New Year 2013

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were served well staying here and will strongly consider staying here (in a bigger room) if we find ourselves in Hong Kong again!
reviews.title: Just right!

reviews.text: The inn is very small and may not be suitable for those having problem with tight spaces. The lobby itself is a combination of a small kitchen and reception area. But inside and outside the room is very clean and equipped with water dispenser, refrigerator and microwave shared with others within the same floor....and free Wi-Fi too from the comfort of your own room. The security of the building starts from the main entrance of the building (with passwords), to the main door of the rooms (card and psword) and another card to enter your room, not forgetting the CC TV. And if you are hungry, no need to go far. There are local eateries available along the building block.
reviews.title: InnSight....small but very clean and equipped with basic necessity

reviews.text: Once i stepped into this hotel , I can feel the warmth as the rooms are amazingly clean which I did not expected , the staffs are friendly , they would greet my whenever I'm out of the room . the location is so convinient , no matter how lazy are you , you'll still not be out of hunger!!!:)
reviews.title: Clean , Convinient , Staffs are friendly :)
Clean guesthouse right in the heart of TST
reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 nights during my stopover in HKG, visiting friends. Although the guesthouse is considered a small establishment, however the cleanliness and security wise, it did not fail.. Room was clean and tidy, with television and aircon provided. It's VERY near to most attractions in TST (i.e. Star Ferry, Sogo, bustling streets, and right opposite iSquare).
I could jut go down and shop, and go up the room to put my things before going for shopping again. It's just that close. Shirley, Elaine and Kaman were friendly, & hospitable.
reviews.title: Excellent service and Clean place

reviews.text: Located conveniently at TST, it's very accessible to get around. Both my mum and I stayed there for 4 nights and we enjoyed our stay there tremendously. We were hosted by Karman and she provided excellent services. I am impressed with her command of English and hospitality provided. The rooms are clean and though they are pretty small, i guessed all the rooms in HK are faced with space constraint.
reviews.title: Thank You InnSight

description: InnSight is a hostel in Hong Kong which pledges to provide our guests with hospitality, coziness and cleanliness; all in all, a home-like atmosphere. We hope to offer not only a place for a comfy overnight stay, but a platform for making new friends, nourishing cultural understanding as well as sharing ideas and inspirations. Located conveniently in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Innsight is just a stone’s throw away from a large variety of cuisines that will tantalize your taste buds, with less than a 2-minute walk to the metro that links you up to attractions all over Hong Kong, and a 3-minute walk to the most renowned Victoria Harbour where you will be stunned by the magnificent scenery.Feeling exhausted after a day of traveling, shopping and sight-seeing? All you need is a place where you can unwind and relax from the hustle and bustle. Our rooms are all meticulously furnished and well equipped with private bathroom, air conditioning, free wifi and a 22” Sony HD TV which supports USB connection and Skype.Let’s enrich your traveling experience here at InnSight!
